page.title: 13NATION-WIDE BOATS,UNSTONE.
page.content: Brierley Bridge, Sheffield Road. PLC, directors GS Jackson & wife. Live on premises,1 acre, 8 part-time staff. Opened June 1984. 400 boats sold first yr. 3 small showrooms, 100 boats on display, surf-boards to large yachts. Customers from all Britain,even main- land Europe. Boats obtained all-parts. Agents Scotland, south coast England. Plan bigger covered area, desire more car park. Security no problem. Bounded River Drone, railway, high fence. "We live in area with 16 million people within 75 miles. M1 motorway nearby with good road network. Customers happy to travel to us. "Hope to expand business. Happy with results so far."
